title: Sample Adventure Novel
intro:
This is a sample adventure novel.
Used to demo and test the Adventure Novel Player application.
author: Alex Znyk

paragraphs.title: The adventure begins
paragraphs.text:
You are in a forest.
In front of you are free paths.
Which way do you go?
paragraphs.question: What will you do next?

paragraphs.title: The adventure continues
paragraphs.text:
You are in a forest.
The path you chose ends
There is no way forward.
Your only option is to turn back.
paragraphs.question: What will you do next?

paragraphs.title: A sinister encounter
paragraphs.text:
In front of you stands a huge bear
The bear is upset by your presence!
paragraphs.question: What will you do?

paragraphs.title: The right way
paragraphs.text:
You have found the right path
You reach the end of the forest.
You have found the town
paragraphs.question: What will you do?

paragraphs.title: A sad end
paragraphs.text:
You were no match for a grown bear
This is a sad end for your adventures.
paragraphs.question: Do you want to start again?
